alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 7:26PM CDT until May 29 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Northeastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... McPherson County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT/715 PM MDT/. * At 726 PM CDT/626 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Swan Lake to 7 miles northwest of Sarben, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tryon, Keystone, Big Bald Hill, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Three Mile Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail, Schnick Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 174 and 210. Highway 97 between mile markers 22 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Thomas
